inclusion.criterion: Males or females, 18 years of age or older.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Diagnosis of sickle cell disease (electrophoretic documentation of SS, SC, or S thalassemia genotype is required) or thalassemia.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Mild to severe pulmonary hypertension with mean pulmonary artery pressure greater than 25 mm Hg at rest or greater than 30 mm Hg during exercise, measured by pulmonary artery catheterization.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Pulmonary artery wedge pressure or left ventricular end-diastolic pressure less than or equal to 18 mm Hg or gradient between pulmonary artery diastolic pressure and wedge pressure greater than 8 mm Hg or echocardiographic criteria to exclude left ventricular dysfunction.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: For female subjects, on a reliable method of birth control or not physically able to bear children.
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Any condition that in the opinion of the study investigators would adversely affect the outcome of the study or the safety of the volunteer.
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has multifactorial chronic hypoxemia and dyspnea thought due to diastolic CHF, pulmonary hypertension thought secondary to a chronic ASD and COPD on 5L home oxygen. Patient tolerated an inpatient sildenafil trial without hypotension.
